title: What is a Payment Gateway?
description: A payment gateway is a tool that helps businesses accept payments online. It securely sends payment details from your website or app to the bank and then confirms if the payment is approved.

title: How does a Payment Gateway work?
description: A payment gateway works by safely sending payment details from the customer to the payment processor, getting approval, and then sending a confirmation back to the website to complete the transaction.

title: How to Add a Payment Gateway to Your Website?
description: To add a payment gateway to your website, choose a payment provider, sign up for an account, use a plugin or API to integrate it, and then test to make sure everything works smoothly.

title: How to Create a Payment Gateway?
description: To create a payment gateway, you need to build a system that allows payments, connect it to different payment methods, add security to protect customer data, and test everything to ensure it works properly.
